greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominator of the polynomial A_l(x) = Sum_{d=1..l-1} x^(l-d)/d for index l=2n+1 evaluated at x=1.
comment: For numerators and explicit examples of the polynomials see A145609.
maple: A := proc(l,x) add(x^(l-d)/d,d=1..l-1) ; end: A145610 := proc(n) denom( A(2*n+1,1)) ; end: seq(A145610(n),n=1..20) ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 21 2009
mathematica: m = 1; aa = {}; Do[k = 0; Do[k = k + m^(2 r + 1 - d)/d, {d, 1, 2 r}]; AppendTo[aa, Denominator[k]], {r, 1, 30}]; aa (* _Artur Jasinski_ *)
results.author: _Artur Jasinski_, Oct 14 2008
